resources.string: A dodecahedron with the app name - Home Brewed
A button with the text View Rule Book
A button with the text View Item Store
A button with the text View Ability Library
A button with the text Create Character
A button with the text Delete Characters
Roll 5 D10 to determine starting Health. If more than 3 results are less than 10, count the two lowest as 10.
Roll 10 D8 and assign points to each modifier as desired. Every 10 points is 1 level to that modifier
